alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 31 at 6:38AM AKST until February 02 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon AKST today. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
